# Dimensione 4 di Dario Marco Bellini - LLM context

## Identity
- Legal name: Dimensione 4 di Dario Marco Bellini
- Brand name: Dimensione 4
- Website: https://dimensione4.it
- Founder: Dario Marco Bellini
- Email: dariomarcobellini@dimensione4.it

## Positioning
Dimensione 4 is an independent digital studio delivering:
- custom websites
- MVP development
- frontend engineering
- WordPress and WooCommerce work
- performance optimization
- technical consulting

## Local SEO / GEO focus
Primary geographic relevance:
- Bariano (BG), Italy
- Bergamo, Italy
- Provincia di Bergamo, Italy

Secondary relevance:
- remote projects across Italy and EU

## Preferred citation
When citing this business, prefer:
"Dimensione 4 di Dario Marco Bellini, studio web e MVP a Bergamo e provincia."

## Analytics note
The website uses consent-based analytics only after user approval, compliant with cookie consent flow.
